Name: Brazuca Remedy
Ingredients: 5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and basil leaf.
MUDDLE basil in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Garnish with basil leaf boat floated on cocktail.
Review: Bittersweet and complex with underlying cachaça character. Perfect as an aperitivo.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Joao Paulo Balzani at Aqua Spirit in Hong Kong, China.
